813620.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: ACID Boot Camp Set
813620.description:
Add Marks, Medals, Party Points, and items with the special ACID Boot Camp Set.

The following will be added:
・[1000] Marks
・[10] Medals
・[50] PP
・[10,000] Marks
・[25] Medals
・[100] PP
・[500,000] Marks
・[50] Medals
・[150] PP

The following items will be added:
・Energy Pill SP x 3
・Energy Pack SP x 3
・Deepas Medicine SP x 3
・Deepas Pack SP x 3
・Remedine Pack EX x 3
・Activator x 3
・Hard Upper x 3
・Act Upper x 3
・Power Upper x 3
・Aim Upper x 3
・Stamina Upper x 3
・Memory Upper x 3
・Speed Upper x 3
・Technical Upper x 3
・Portable Camoflauge Device x 3

・Energy Pill EX x 3
・Energy Pack EX x 3
・Deepas Medicine EX x 3
・Deepas Pack EX x 3
・Remedine Pack Max x 3
・Activator Max x 5
・Hard Upper x 5
・Act Upper x 5
・Power Upper x 5
・Aim Upper x 5
・Stamina Upper x 5
・Memory Upper x 5
・Speed Upper x 5
・Technical Upper x 5
・Portable Analysis Device x 3

・Rob Fiber
・Seek Fiber
・Technical Fiber
・Hard Booster x 5
・Act Booster x 5
・Power Booster x 5
・Aim Booster x 5
・Stamina Booster x 5
・Memory Booster x 5
・Speed Booster x 5
・Technical Booster x 5

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items.
813620.supported_languages:
英语*, 繁体中文, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
